```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(here)
library(zoo)

df <- read_xlsx(here("data/raw", "Households by possession of electrical household equipements 11_18_2018 02_51_51.xlsx"))
print(df)

row1 <- as.character(df[1,])
row2 <- paste0("_", as.character(df[2,]))
df[1,] <- paste0(na.locf(row1, na.rm=FALSE), row2)
df[1, 1:2] <- c("Region", "Year")

newcols <- as.character(df[1, ])
df <- df[3:nrow(df),]
names(df) <- newcols

```
